__e: You've been conned, but don't feel special, all right?
There... Seems to have been some... We've been scammed again, people.
And when you get swindled... under Napoleonic Code, I get swindled too.
In order to move on from host to host the symbiont has to learn to let go of the past
I never cheated on you, and I never would.
You cheated on me and I never want to see you again!
Well, I know he didn't cheat on you, so what happened?
- I can't talk about what happened, but I can tell you that Will didn't cheat on me.
He insists he's never cheated and must've gotten it from her.
And maybe it's time you saw the faces of some of the people you've cheated and hurt just over the last week.
And when he's gone, all of those people that we've crossed, they're gonna come looking for you.
I have no idea how, but you did, and I won't tolerate it.
He thinks I betrayed him, but I didn't.
- Do you think this gesture is enough for you to forgive? - Yes.
That would be great, but I already did when I betrayed him, and I--
He knows our numbers. He knows you have betrayed him.
Are you trying to tell me you cheated because I wanted what was best for our family?
Yeah, and you didn't when you were cheating on her, right?
